member.name: M:DeviceId.DeviceIdBuilderExtensions.OnMac(DeviceId.DeviceIdBuilder,System.Action{DeviceId.MacDeviceIdBuilder})
member.summary: Adds Mac-specific components to the device ID.
member.param: The device ID builder to add the components to.
An action that adds the Mac-specific components.

member.name: T:DeviceId.MacDeviceIdBuilder
member.summary: Provides a fluent interface for adding Mac-specific components to a device identifier.

member.name: M:DeviceId.MacDeviceIdBuilder.#ctor(DeviceId.DeviceIdBuilder)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:DeviceId.MacDeviceIdBuilder.AddComponent(System.String,DeviceId.IDeviceIdComponent)
member.summary: Adds a component to the device identifier. If a component with the specified name already exists, it will be replaced with this newly added component.

member.name: M:DeviceId.MacDeviceIdBuilderExtensions.AddSystemDriveSerialNumber(DeviceId.MacDeviceIdBuilder)
member.summary: Adds the system drive serial number to the device identifier.
member.param: The to add the component to.

member.name: M:DeviceId.MacDeviceIdBuilderExtensions.AddPlatformSerialNumber(DeviceId.MacDeviceIdBuilder)
member.summary: Adds the platform serial number to the device identifier.
member.param: The to add the component to.
